item.description:
FRIDAY DECEMBER 7 -Driving Miss Daisy with the Connecticut Theatre Group * Winner of the 1988 Pulitzer Prize

Includes Pre Party and Afterparty
15% discount on food and drinks at Pre-Party

*PLUS: FREE Wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park *

ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED PRE-PARTY AND AFTERPARTY INFO

**PLUS – Save 15% on you food and drinks at the Pre-Party with your Connecticut Theatre Group Ticket**

"The Best Professional Theater Company in Connecticut" - BroadwayWorld.com

Playhouse on Park is Hartford's most affordable and intimate professional theater, Playhouse on Park, is nestled on Park Road in West Hartford, where the parking is free, the actors are right off Broadway and the back row is just four seats from the stage.

Winner of the 1988 Pulitzer Prize for Drama and inspiring the Academy Award-winning film, Driving Miss Daisy is a compassionate and humorous tale of an unlikely relationship between an aging Jewish woman and her soft-spoken black chauffeur.

Set in the Deep South in 1948, we see their friendship develop over the course of thirty years through a series of compelling scenes. Through an era of great racial strife, their relationship grows and despite their differences, their mutual dependence draws them together. Driving Miss Daisy is an inspiring and moving tale that explores the depths of humanity and the process of growing older.

"Driving Miss Daisy is a total delight."

- NY Daily News

"A perfectly poised and shaped miniature on the odd-couple theme."

- New York Post

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

Pre-Party starts at 6:30pm - Show starts at 8pm

Advance Tickets are $25

* Tickets are $32.50 at the event

PLUS: FREE Wine and Cheese Party at Playhouse on Park

Playhouse on Park
244 Park Road
West Hartford, CT 06119

EXIT 43 PARK ROAD off 84

Next to AC Petersons
FREE SAFE PARKING

PRE-PARTY INFO WILL BE EMAILED TO ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS

Pick up your ticket before the show at the Pre-Party with the Connecticut Theatre Group, or at the ticket window

WE HAVE A VERY LIMITED NUMBER OF TICKETS IN THE CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP SECTION

THIS EVENT WILL SELL OUT - GET YOUR TICKET NOW

ALL CONNECTICUT THEATRE GROUP TICKET HOLDERS WILL BE EMAILED PRE-PARTY AND AFTERPARTY INFO

**PLUS – Save 15% on you food and drinks at the Pre-Party with your Connecticut Theatre Group Ticket**

"The Best Professional Theater Company in Connecticut" - BroadwayWorld.com

Playhouse on Park is Hartford's most affordable and intimate professional theater, Playhouse on Park, is nestled on Park Road in West Hartford, where the parking is free, the actors are right off Broadway and the back row is just four seats from the stage.


Visit http://www.CTTheatre.org or call (860) 987-7888

 

HOLIDAY GIFT CERTIFICATES ARE AVAILABLE FOR THAT PERFECT GIFT!
item.how_to_find_us: Pick up your ticket at the pre party or before the show starting at 7:45pm at the ticket window

group.name: Entertainment CT .com VIP Club Music Theatre Golf Friends
